Html:
I've tried to upload an entry form to an event but get the following error.

Exception Details: System.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path 'e:\HostingSpaces\*********\wwwroot\Documents\EntryForm2007.pdf' is denied.

I guess I need to set rights somewhere on the server on Ultimahosts, but where?

Anyone help?

Thanks
Try setting "write" access from the "Website" part of your UltimaHosts account. That should do it.

z2bass wrote:
Try setting "write" access from the "Website" part of your UltimaHosts account. That should do it.


got it, thanks
